author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Over 50 nuclear weapons have gone missing, and some are still lost today. How did they disappear in the first place? How can they be recovered? And how safe are we? 

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science
